sourcesContent:
<template>
    <ReadCRUD :characters = "chars"></ReadCRUD>
</template>

<script>
// @ is an alias to /src
import ReadCRUD from '@/components/ReadCRUD.vue'
import {public_key,ts,hash,populateAux,getAux,aux} from '../marvel.js'
import axios from 'axios';

export default {
  name: 'ReadView',
  //mixins: [populateAux],
         
  data() {
        return {
            chars: []
        };
    },
  components: {
    ReadCRUD
  },
    created:function(){
        console.dir(this.chars);
        //console.dir(JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(this.chars)));
            this.listCharacters();
          
  },
  methods: {
        listCharacters() {

            //if((JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(aux))).length == 0){
            console.log("listCharacters");
                axios.get(`https://gateway.marvel.com/v1/public/characters?ts=${ts}&apikey=${public_key}&hash=${hash}`)
                .then((result) => {

                console.log(result);
                result.data.data.results.forEach(element => {
                    if (!element.description) {
                        element.description = "No description available.";
                   }
                    populateAux(element);
                });
                this.chars = getAux();
                console.dir(this.chars);
                console.dir(aux);
               
            })
                .catch((error) => {
                console.log(error);
            });
            //}
        }
    },
}
</script>
